Text:
finally one in the series that really IS for complete idiots.
I wonder if they  have one from an opposing perspective -  teaching how to be a fake psychic. Cold reading techniques and such.

LOL... Of course, there's no need to post the torrent. The psychics will know where to get the book. Also, being serious for a moment... I hear that this year's Psychics Convention in LA has been cancelled due to "unforeseen circumstances".
